name: Big Horn Gravel

location.region: White River National Forest and Vail Valley

distances.name: Ram's Horn Escape
distances.description: High, rough, and lonesome - tops out at ~11,000 ft

terrain.description: High altitude Colorado Rockies terrain starting/finishing near Gypsum Sports Complex, extended time above 9,000ft in White River National Forest

typical.conditions: High altitude mountain weather, possible afternoon storms, extended time above 9,000ft

uniqueCharacteristics: High altitude racing (8000+ ft base, reaching 11,000 ft)
